# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes an empty URL sesson task.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Don’t use this initializer directly. Instead, create tasks from a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSession].

## Deprecated

- **new()**: Creates a new URL session task.

items.description: Creates a new URL session task.
items.name: new()

title: init()
